content.raw:
Looking at the code, it [appears to already conflict with gazebo3](#!/osrf/gazebo4-release/src/d0592100dc4eec59ca4666f1734f7ddc5c7617c3/ubuntu/debian/control?at=default#cl-79)

However, when I do `apt-cache show gazebo4`:
~~~
$ apt-cache show gazebo4
Package: gazebo4
Version: 4.0.0-2~trusty
Architecture: amd64
...
Conflicts: gazebo, gazebo-current, gazebo4-nightly, gazebo4-prerelease
Multi-Arch: foreign
...
~~~
I don't see gazebo3 in that list.
content.html:
Looking at the code, it appears to already conflict with gazebo3

However, when I do apt-cache show gazebo4:

$ apt-cache show gazebo4
Package: gazebo4
Version: 4.0.0-2~trusty
Architecture: amd64
...
Conflicts: gazebo, gazebo-current, gazebo4-nightly, gazebo4-prerelease
Multi-Arch: foreign
...

I don't see gazebo3 in that list.
